title: Elegance Defined: Diamond-Studded Gold Kanganalu (Bangles)
materials: 22K Gold (Swarna) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds; Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and lustre.
features: Linear design featuring a continuous row of brilliantly cut diamonds, securely bezel set in 22K gold. The slim, modern profile contrasts beautifully with the traditional gold hue. Finished with a fine Hyderabadi polish for extra brilliance.
colors: Warm 22K Gold (gold) and Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions such as weddings
or a sophisticated cocktail party. A modern take on the traditional bangle
ideal for the contemporary Indian woman.
description: These kanganalu seamlessly blend modern design with the timeless beauty of gold and diamonds. The high-quality diamonds offer exceptional sparkle, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the richness of the gold. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable to wear for extended periods, adding a touch of elegance to any outfit. This is a truly investment piece for your 'Pelli Sammagri'.
